issue.title: [Rust] Fix bugs in TPC-H file conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10994](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10994). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The utility in tpch for converting tbl files to CSV/Parquet no longer works now that we have multiple tables.

The UX is also terrible and the tool only supports generating uncompressed parquet files.

I'm going to create one PR to fix these things to make this more usable.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10994?focusedCommentId=17252806) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8978
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8978>
